title: Mordekaiser: Where's my shield gone?
body:
I like the idea of what Riot is trying to do with the juggernauts, it's hopefully going to make the game a lot more interesting, but how I understood it Morde's W was going to have it's damage shifted so that it would only deal damage when it was activated on an ally *champion*. It makes sense, subtle nudge toward duo lanes with Morde, and a speed buff is always nice with how damn slow he is - but what I don't like is not having it available without another champion (or pet) nearby.

Ok they reworked the ability, fine. But please give me *something* for when I'm in a solo lane, or when my support is not humping my leg. Please?

EDIT: Also, thoughts on new animation for E? I liked the "summoning random metal" more.

replies.body: Yeh, I have no idea why they would DESTROY his solo laning power in order to force him into a gimmicky bot lane... atleast let you W a minion even if they nerf the damage it does in order to allow you to do it.
